title: Moz News - MozMoz logoMenu openMenu closeSearchMoz logo
description: Your all-in-one suite of SEO essentials.
content: J By: Justin Vanning January 21, 2013 Results of Our 1st Annual Moz Chili Cook-off Moz News Last week, we held our 1st Moz Chili Cook-off and, much to our delicious delight, had such a blast that we decided to make it an annual event! Check out the highlights and results of this fierce competition, along with recipes for the winning chilis. Read this post By: Ashley Sefferman January 3, 2013 The Best of 2012: Top Posts and People of the Year Moz News Now that the year has come to a close, it's time to take a look back at the posts and people who rocked 2012. Check out the best of the Moz blog last year had to offer, along with some awesome extras along the way. Enjoy! Read this post By: Nick Sayers December 19, 2012 Help Team University Moz News At Moz, we strive to give our customers the best experience possible when using our product and interacting with our team members. Help Team University is our new program that gives everyone across all teams the chance to support our customers and hear their voice! Read this post By: Rand Fishkin December 4, 2012 Announcing Our Acquisition of GetListed & Plans to Help Local Marketers & SEOs Moz News It has been a tremendously exciting year here at SEOmoz. Today, we're excited to announce that we've taken a big step toward the future of Moz with the acquisition of GetListed, and the addition of David Mihm to the SEOmoz team! Read this post By: Anthony Skinner November 28, 2012 Biting the Bullet of Technical Debt Moz News Sometimes when you have to bite the bullet, it's not a clean bite; you've got to gnaw away at it until you finally break through. So it goes with our technical debt, but we've got a plan to erase the worst of it over the next 18 months. Read this post J By: Justin Vanning November 1, 2012 Moz #Movember Kick-Off Moz News The Moz team is joining the #Movember movement and are growing mustaches to raise awareness for men's health issues. Help us by donating! Read this post By: Joel Day October 31, 2012 Draw Roger Winners! Moz News For your afternoon Halloween pleasure, we're announcing the winners of our Draw Roger Contest! We received some amazing Roger-based art entries. Check them out! Read this post By: Erica McGillivray October 31, 2012 #Mozinars: They're Back, and They're Free! Moz News Good things come to those who wait, and you've all been waiting patiently for our new Mozinar series. We're happy to announce that our Mozinars are back and better than ever. Best of all, they're now free for everyone! Read this post By: Joel Day October 22, 2012 Draw Roger Contest Moz News We sat down with the SEOmoz Art Director, Derric Wise, and he unveiled the mechanics behind drawing everyone's favorite robot. Now it's your turn: learn how to draw Roger and enter our contest! All entries are due by Sunday, October 28th at 9pm PST. Read this post By: Erica McGillivray October 5, 2012 Fun Unlocked: #Mozcation Milwaukee 2012 Moz News This past Wednesday, October 3rd, Moz invaded Milwaukee for a Mozcation. Our gratious host, Kyle Faber from Regal Creative helped set us up at that Harley Davidson Musuem and show us the best beer. Read this post J By: John Cashman October 3, 2012 Story and Strategy: One of SEOmoz's Secret Shoppers Moz News As a respondent in the recent SEOmoz PEPS case study project, my team and I had the chance to evaluate our digital marketing strategies and practices. In this post, I share our experience as a participant in the study and highlight the strategies that moved us into the top five respondents. Read this post By: Dr. Peter J. Meyers September 29, 2012 Google's EMD Algo Update - Early Data Moz News Google announced an "upcoming" algorithm change targeting low-quality Exact-Match Domains on 9/28. Data from MozCast indicated the change did hit on 9/28 - I break down the data, along with some of the sites impacted. Read this post By: Dr. Peter J. Meyers September 20, 2012 New on Mozcast - 5 Real-time Top-view Metrics Moz News The Google algorithm is too complicated to be understood in just one number, so we're happy to announce five new "top view" metrics on MozCast, including: Domain Diversity, SERP Count, EMD Influence, PMD Influence, and the "Big 10" domains. Read this post By: Rand Fishkin September 18, 2012 2012 #MozCon Videos Are Here Moz News The 2012 MozCon videos have arrived! Get all 29 presentations and slide-decks with cutting edge content from the brightest minds in our industry. Read this post
